analysis.functional_summary: This JCL script is used to compile and link-edit a BMS map named BNK1DAM. It utilizes a procedure named MAPGEN and specifies the member BNK1DAM with a relocation mode of ANY. The output is directed to a specified location.
data_flow: Step 1: The JCL script is executed to initiate the compile and link-edit process.
Step 2: The MAPGEN procedure processes the BNK1DAM member.
Step 3: The output is generated and directed to the specified output location.
state_changes: Creation of compiled and link-edited BMS map file
side_effects: File I/O operations for reading the member and writing the output
interface_points: File system interfaces for reading and writing files
modernization_notes: Consider refactoring JCL to use modern build tools or scripts.
Evaluate the use of modern CI/CD pipelines for automation.
analysis.analysis_notes: The JCL script is straightforward, primarily serving as a build script for a specific BMS map. It relies on external procedures and libraries, which are not detailed in the provided content.
